countries.name: United States
countries.description: Home to world-renowned universities with cutting-edge research facilities and diverse academic programs
additional_requirements: SAT/ACT for undergraduate, GRE/GMAT for graduate programs

countries.name: Canada
countries.description: High-quality education system with excellent post-graduation work opportunities and pathway to permanent residence
countries.language_requirement: IELTS 6.5+ or TOEFL 90+ (English), TEF/DELF for French programs

countries.name: United Kingdom
countries.description: Prestigious universities with rich academic tradition and shorter program durations
countries.language_requirement: IELTS 6.5+ or TOEFL 90+ (varies by university and program)
additional_requirements: Academic Technology Approval Scheme (ATAS) for some subjects

countries.name: Australia
countries.description: World-class universities with strong research focus and excellent student support services
countries.application_deadline: October-December for February intake, April-May for July intake

countries.name: Germany
countries.description: Excellent engineering and technical programs with low tuition fees at public universities
countries.language_requirement: German: DSH-2 or TestDaF 4, English programs: IELTS 6.5+ or TOEFL 90+
countries.application_deadline: July 15 for winter semester, January 15 for summer semester
additional_requirements: Student visa required for non-EU students
Proof of financial resources (€10,332 per year)

countries.name: France
countries.description: Rich cultural heritage with strong programs in arts, business, and engineering
countries.language_requirement: French: DELF B2/DALF C1, English programs: IELTS 6.5+ or TOEFL 90+
additional_requirements: French language proficiency test may be required

countries.name: Netherlands
countries.description: High-quality education with many English-taught programs and innovative teaching methods
countries.language_requirement: IELTS 6.5+ or TOEFL 90+ for English programs, Dutch proficiency for Dutch programs
countries.application_deadline: May 1 for September intake (varies by program)
additional_requirements: Residence permit required for non-EU students
Numerus fixus for some competitive programs

countries.name: Switzerland
countries.description: World-renowned universities with strong research focus and multilingual environment
countries.language_requirement: Varies by canton and university (German, French, Italian, or English)
countries.avg_tuition: CHF 500-2,000 per semester (public), CHF 20,000-40,000 per year (private)
additional_requirements: Student visa required for non-EU students
Proof of financial resources (CHF 21,000 per year)
